description:
The Fujimizaka New Year Festival will feature a guest performance by Karan Eri of Appliyama 470! But Copipemon works some mischief to fill the town with Eri videos! Will the concert to celebrate her new CD be canceled?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eri ga Copy-Pa de Dai Zoushoku!? Torimodose, Yume no Stage!
Eri`s Copy-Pasted Everywhere? Restore the Dream Concert!
エリがコピペで大増殖!? とりもどせ, 夢のステージ!
